nodes.text: Consignment is a Living Force adventure. It was part one of the Trade War trilogy, written by Megan Robertson and released in 2001.

The heroes are hired by a man claiming to be called Frome Eubarus, who claims to work for Mothven Star Trading and he sends them to deliver some cargo from Hedrett Groundport to a Mothven compound. However, the real Eubarus was on holiday and the man was actually called Jarett Hurgen, while the cargo consisted of drugs and an explosive device. However, with the help of the Office of Peace and Security, the heroes are able to unravel the plot and do not deliever the cargo.
